# ambzre

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/ambzre)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ambzre)
<!-- badges: end -->

El objetivo de **ambzre** es permitir la revisión y estandarización de las tablas de atributos de los shapefiles producidos por el componente ambiental del proyecto ZRE41.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ambzre like so:

``` r
# remotes::install_github("PaulESantos/ambzre")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# library(ambzre)
## basic example code
```
